content.description: This has easy climbing til roof. Pull one move wonder over roof on very thin holds, go to an easy finish.
content.location: It is on the far right side under steep roof of West Hurricane Wall.

content.description: Use good body position all the way up this climb. It is very nice.
content.location: This is the 2nd route on the wall working from the right.

content.description: This route is really fun. Smeary feet with good hands.
content.location: This is the last route on the wall.

content.description: This route has face moves to a roof.
content.location: This is the first route on the wall's right side.

content.description:
Start between the pine tree at the lowest corner on the right side of the West Wall, and climb up the crack and ledges to the high first bolt for the first route on the West Wall. Supplemental gear in the crack can be placed if the exposure to the gully is an issue.

Angle up and left clipping the second bolt on

Storm Surge

. Pass under the

Storm Surge

roof pinching the sharp corner on the left side of the roof to get to the 3rd bolt for Eye of the Storm.

Continue on fairly sustained holds to the 4th bolt for Eye of the Storm and on to the 4th bolt from the

F.E.M.A.

route.

Work your way up and left to the last bolt for Eye of the Storm located in the black water streak.

Finish with one or two moves to the flake and easier ground up and left to

Balloon Boy

anchors.
content.location:
Starting at the lowest point of the West Face, you can see a natural line starting in the crack below the first route on the right side of the wall then angling up and left under

Storm Surge's

roof and finishing at the anchors for

Balloon Boy

(4th route on the wall).

content.description: This has easy climbing to a steep face.
content.location: It is the 3rd route from the right.

content.description: This route has slab moves with some weird footwork.
content.location: It is the 4th route from the right.
